title: New Rules Aim To Keep School Doors Open For Undocumented Students
teaser: The Obama administration is issuing new guidelines to keep states from barring the children of undocumented immigrants from attending public school. The Supreme Court has guaranteed these children free access to a public education, but some states appear to be denying it anyway.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
